data.content:
Tính từ
teo, bị teo
hao mòn

noun
[noncount] medical :gradual loss of muscle or flesh usually because of disease or lack of use
The doctor is concerned about possible atrophy of the shoulder muscles. - often used figuratively
emotional/intellectual atrophy [=loss of emotional/intellectual strength]
verb
-phies; -phied; -phying
[no obj] medical :to become weak from lack of use :to suffer from atrophy
Her muscles atrophied during her illness.
After her surgery, she received therapy to keep the muscles from atrophying.
